mapper.update: UPDATE USER u SET u.USER_AUTHORITY = CASE WHEN u.USER_AUTHORITY = '1' AND (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.TOTAL_PRICE), 0) FROM ORDERS o WHERE o.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE AND o.PAYMENT_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)) >= 100000 THEN '2' WHEN u.USER_AUTHORITY = '2' AND (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.TOTAL_PRICE), 0) FROM ORDERS o WHERE o.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE AND o.PAYMENT_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)) < 100000 THEN '1' ELSE u.USER_AUTHORITY END WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ORDERS o WHERE o.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE AND o.PAYMENT_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) );
